actionConfiguration.body:
with CTE_sumtotal as (
	SELECT video_id,created_time,total_video_views
	FROM public.smg_dmp_fb_video_dashboard_unq_view 
	WHERE view_date = date_trunc('month', now() - interval '11 months'):: date -1
	group by video_id,created_time,total_video_views),
CTE_view_date as (
	SELECT video_id,created_time,total_video_views
	FROM public.smg_dmp_fb_video_dashboard_unq_view 
	WHERE view_date = '{{moment().add(-1,'year').format("YYYY-MM-01")}}':: date
	group by video_id,created_time,total_video_views)
select sum(cast(CTE_sumtotal.total_video_views as decimal) 
		   - cast(CTE_view_date.total_video_views as decimal))
			as COUNT_Prevyearmonth 
from CTE_sumtotal full join CTE_view_date 
on CTE_sumtotal.video_id=CTE_view_date.video_id
